summary: An ordinance relating to the Lighting Dept.; creating a special fund designated "City of Seattle--Dept. of Lighting--Boundary Project Revolving Fund" for use in connection with construction of the City's Boundary hydroelectric development project in Pend Oreille County; making an appropriation from the Light Fund in connection therewith, and abolishing the "City of Seattle--Dept. of Lighting--Construction Revolving Fund" created by Ordinance 78428.
